PHRASE.LANG: Sometimes you can't spend all day in your apartment as you have to head to important meetings and social events. Take a trip through a scenic environment whilst relaxing with your friends as the world outside passes you by. [#Legal]
Il est parfois nécessaire de quitter son appartement pour se rendre à des réunions ou réceptions importantes. Traversez un superbe paysage tout en discutant tranquillement avec vos amis. [#Legal]

Manchmal kann man nicht den ganzen Tag in seinem Apartment verbringen, z.B. wenn wichtige Meetings und soziale Ereignisse anstehen. Unternimm eine Reise durch eine wunderschöne Umgebung und entspanne mit deinen Freunden, während die Welt da draußen an dir vorüberzieht. [#Legal]

A volte non ti è possibile passare la giornata nell'appartamento, per via di incontri importanti ed eventi sociali. Rilassati in compagnia dei tuoi amici con un viaggio in un ambiente pittoresco e osserva il mondo scorrere all'esterno. [#Legal]

A veces no puedes tirarte todo el día en el apartamento por tener que acudir a reuniones importantes y eventos sociales. Viaja por un entorno paisajístico al tiempo que te relajas con tus amigos y veis el mundo pasar por la ventana. [#Legal]

Sometimes you can't spend all day in your apartment as you have to head to important meetings and social events. Take a trip through a scenic environment whilst relaxing with your friends as the world outside passes you by. [#Legal]
